item.title: Grace Hopper Celebration 2018
item.description: I’m here in Houston, TX attending the Grace Hopper Celebration for the first time! It’s exhilarating to be finally attending, I’ve wanted to go for years but the scheduling just didn’t work out. Last year, I got my internship with The Walt Disney Company for Summer 2018 through the Resume Database. Spotlight picture from DisneyTech
